EmailTemplate.subject: WRIK Youth Board Presents: OPENMINDED - THIS SATURDAY!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
Whether you're finished with exams, sill have some coming up or just want a reason to be part of NCS all over again; make sure you grab yourself and a mate a ticket - AND THE BEST BIT IS THAT THEY DON'T HAVE TO BE AN NCS GRAD!
We are the WRIK YouthBoard, and our Project is called OpenMindEd. Through engaging presentations and active workshops, we plan to educate youths regarding current Mental Health issues, in the hopes that they stop seeing those with Mental Health issues in a negative way. We guarantee stress-relief, fun, and a chance to socialise and catch up with friends, and to make new ones! So join us, on Saturday 25th June, from 2pm â€“ 5pm!"
GET YOUR TICKET NOW! HERE!
DETAILS
Date: THIS SATURDAY 25TH JUNE Time: 2PM - 5PM Location: Kingston Quaker Centre Fairfield E, Kingston upon Thames KT1 2PT Description: There will be different workshops, free food, prize givaways and a guest speaker!
If you have any questions or queries, or want to know more feel free to email us on tcs.southwestlondon@the-challenge.org. SEE YOU THERE!
